bioAsHtml: Ashwanth Kumar is a Principal Software Engineer working in Data Ingestion Team @indix. While he's not fiddling with distributed Systems and data. He contributes to Open Source and helps organises meetups and tech events in the City. He writes Scala at work and Go at home.

acceptedTalks.title: Using Monoids for Large Scale Business Stats
